name: Lifeline: Emergency Response (zFreezeD)
description:
This game was created for the Lost Relic Game Jam in 8 days

https://itch.io/jam/lost-relic-games-1

Welcome Operator

In Lifeline: Emergency Response you need to connect people in need with the right department.

● Accept the call to help
● Look at the need of the caller
● Find the nearest department of the callers need
● Connect the caller with the department using the same colored cable
● Wait for the department car to be send
● Hurry up, it gets faster!

Thank you for playing.
